subject: NCAA Basketball Tournament (Men)
College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Kevin Anderson scored a game-high 25 points, including a clinching fadeaway with 18.9 seconds left, to lift the 12th-seeded Spiders to an upset of No. 5 Vanderbilt.
snippet: Kevin Anderson scored a game-high 25 points, including a clinching fadeaway with 18.9 seconds left, to lift the 12th-seeded Spiders to an upset of No. 5 Vanderbilt.
